text: The 2017 Louisiana–Lafayette Ragin' Cajuns baseball team represents the University of Louisiana at Lafayette in the 2017 NCAA Division I baseball season. The Ragin' Cajuns play their home games at M. L. Tigue Moore Field at Russo Park and were led by twenty-third year head coach Tony Robichaux. ==Preseason== ===Sun Belt Conference Coaches Poll=== The Sun Belt Conference Coaches Poll was released on February 8, 2017. Louisiana-Lafayette was picked to finish first in the West Division with 72 votes and 12 first-place votes; every first place vote available.https://ragincajuns.com/news/2017/2/8/ragin- cajuns-baseball-named-unanimous-choice-to-win-west-division-by-sun-belt- coaches.aspx?path=baseball {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |align="center" Colspan="3" |Coaches poll (West) |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1 || Louisiana-Lafayette || 70 (10) |- align="center" | 2 || UT Arlington || 50 |- align="center" | 3 || Little Rock || 45 |- align="center" | 4 || Texas State || 44 |- align="center" | 5 || Arkansas State || 27 |- align="center" | 6 || Louisiana-Monroe || 14 |- align="center" |} ===Preseason All-Sun Belt team=== The Preseason All-Sun Belt Team was announced on February 2, 2017 and consisted of four Ragin' Cajun players.https://ragincajuns.com/news/2017/2/2/four-ragin-cajuns-tabbed-to- preseason-all-sun-belt-conference-baseballl-team?path=baseball *Andrew Beckwith (CCU, SR, Pitcher) *Evan Challenger (GASO, R-SR, Pitcher) *Gunner Leger (ULL, JR, Pitcher) *Dylan Moore (ULL, JR, Pitcher) *Brady Cox (UTA, SR, Catcher) *Ryan Cleveland (GASO, SR, 1st Base) *Jonathan Ortega (TXST, SO, 2nd Base) *Drew LaBounty (USA, R-JR, Shortstop) *Seth Lancaster (CCU, JR, 3rd Base) *Dalton Thomas (LR, SR, Outfield) *Billy Cooke (CCU, JR, Outfield) *Travis Swaggerty (USA, SO, Outfield) *Steven Sensley (ULL, JR, Designated Hitter) *Joe Robbins (ULL, SR, Utility) ==Roster== {| class="toccolours" style="text-align: left; font-size:90%;" |- ! colspan="9" style="; text- align:center;"| 2017 Louisiana-Lafayette Ragin' Cajuns roster |- |width="03"| |valign="top"| Pitchers *2 Colton Schmidt - Junior *5 Colton Lee - Senior *6 Nick Lee - Sophomore *17 Gunner Leger - Junior *18 Evan Guillory - Junior *22 Trent Cormier - Senior *24 Caleb Armstrong - Freshman *26 Jevin Huval - Senior *29 Chris Charpentier - Senior *30 Hogan Harris - Sophomore *31 Wyatt Marks - Junior *32 Logan Stoelke - Junior *38 Oliver Campbell - Freshman *40 Dylan Moore - Junior *42 Haden Erbe - Freshman *43 Jacob Norman - Redshirt Freshman *45 Jack Burk - Redshirt Freshman Catchers *1 Ryne Ray - Redshirt Freshman *23 Handsome Monica - Junior *34 Josh Aguilar - Freshman |width="15"| | valign="top" | Infielders *4 Dylan Poncho - Sophomore *10 Brad Antchak - Senior *11 Alex Pinero - Senior *12 Joe Robbins - Senior *13 Brenn Conrad - Senior *14 Kennon Fontenot - Junior *19 Hunter Kasuls - Sophomore *27 Steven Sensley - Junior *41 Monroe Moll - Freshman Outfielders *8 Zach Lafleur - Junior *9 Todd Lott - Freshman *28 Tyler Stover - Junior *33 Jamarius Williams - Junior *35 Ishmael Edwards - Senior *46 Tremaine Spears - Freshman |} ===Coaching staff=== {| class="toccolours" style="text-align: left; font- size:90%;" |- ! colspan="9" style="; text-align:center;"| 2016 Louisiana- Lafayette Ragin' Cajuns coaching staff |- | style="font-size: 95%;" valign="top" | *Tony Robichaux - Head Coach – 22nd year *Anthony Babineaux - Associate Head Coach – 22nd year *Jeremy Talbot - Assistant Head Coach – 3rd year *Daniel Freeman - Volunteer Assistant Coach – 2nd year *Chris Domingue - Director of Baseball Operations – 14th year *Greg Davis - Student Assistant *Tyler Girouard - Manager *Debbie Guilbeaux - Administrative Assistant *Jacob Raggio - Clubhouse Manager *Colin Burgess - Clubhouse Manager *Kaleb Istre - Field Manager *Jared Stelly - Field Manager *Victoria Stringer - Student Assistant |} ==Schedule and results== Louisiana–Lafayette announced its 2017 baseball schedule on October 31, 2016. The 2017 schedule consists of 27 home and 29 away games in the regular season. The Ragin' Cajuns will host Sun Belts foes Appalachian State, Arkansas State, Georgia Southern, South Alabama, and Texas State and will travel to Coastal Carolina, Little Rock, Louisiana–Monroe, Texas–Arlington, and Troy. The 2017 Sun Belt Conference Championship will be contested May 24–28 in Statesboro, Georgia, and will be hosted by Georgia Southern. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !colspan="2"|Legend |- |bgcolor="#ddffdd"| ||Louisiana-Lafayette win |- |bgcolor="#ffdddd"| ||Louisiana-Lafayette loss |- |bgcolor="#bbbbbb"| ||Postponement |- |Bold||Louisiana-Lafayette team member |} {| class="toccolours" width=95% style="clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; text- align:center;" |- ! colspan=2 style="" | 2017 Louisiana–Lafayette Ragin' Cajuns Baseball Game Log |- ! colspan=2 style="" | Regular Season (35-20-1) |- valign="top" | {| class="wikitable collapsible" style="margin:auto; width:100%; text-align:center; font-size:95%" ! colspan=12 style="padding- left:4em;" | February (4-3) |- !
